column4: I have a Tablet with Win7.  I want to install Ubuntu on an SD Card.  If I set /boot to the main drive (sd1) and the rest to the SD card, will grub boot without the SD Card installed?
bootloader will go to sda1 mrb
Grub's configuration and kernel images (as well as initramfs) are stored in /boot. In Ubuntu, /etc/grub.d and /etc/default/grub are also important. However, grub itself resides in MBR.
